boat.name: Leven Lady
boat.full_description: Slate grey Bayraider 20 by Swallow Yachts. Fast, stable (see videos on internet) shallow draft, Gunter ketch. Wooden main mast and boom, carbon gaff and mizzen. Additional cut-down carbon gaff and main. Compass. 4 stroke Yamaha in well. Anchor, chain and rode, fenders, warps. Overall and mooring covers. Road trailer serviced. New tyres. Antifouled.

for_sales.sales_text: Slate grey Bayraider 20 by Swallow Yachts. Fast, stable (see videos on internet) shallow draft, Gunter ketch. Wooden main mast and boom, carbon gaff and mizzen. Additional cut-down carbon gaff and main. Compass. 4 stroke Yamaha in well. Anchor, chain and rode, fenders, warps. Overall and mooring covers. Road trailer serviced. New tyres. Antifouled. Lying Bury St Edmunds.
